other_tests.procedure_name: Flexible bronchoscopy with video-assisted thoracoscopic evaluation
other_tests.findings: Pleural-biopsy specimens showed nests of epithelioid tumor cells, some with numerous admixed lymphocytes separated by thick, hyalinized fibrous bands, diagnostic of type B2 thymoma, with areas of type B3 thymoma.
Examination revealed colonic mucosa with reactive epithelial injury, prominent crypt-cell apoptosis, mild lymphocytosis, and extensive loss of goblet cells.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Findings are consistent with autoimmune enteropathy.

other_tests.findings: Chronic duodenitis with villous shortening, reactive epithelial injury, basal-cell apoptosis, and loss of goblet and Paneth cells.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Findings are consistent with autoimmune enteropathy.

other_tests.date: Five months after the initial presentation
other_tests.findings: Slight hypocellularity in the bone marrow with maturing myeloid precursors and megakaryocytes but no erythroid precursors.
